name: Mission Council on Alcohol Abuse for the Spanish Speaking (MCAASS)
description: Since 1978, Mission Council on Alcohol Abuse for the Spanish Speaking (MCAASS) provides drug and alcohol outpatient counseling services to individuals and families living in the San Francisco Bay Area. MCAASS services clients from all socio-economical backgrounds and are committed to addressing issues such as drug and alcohol abuse and its effect on self-esteem, life and families.

address: 154 A Capp Street, San Francisco, CA, 94110
